org.araneaframework.uilib.list.util
Class ListUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.list.util.ListUtil
public abstract class ListUtil
extends Object

Util methods for Aranea Lists.

There are following methods:

  • Filter form to filter info transformation and vice-versa
  • Creating lazy expressions from list filter, order and corresponding info
  • Reading ListOrder

Since:
1.1
Author:
Rein Raudj√§rv

readFilterInfo

public static Map readFilterInfo(FormWidget form)
Retrieves filter info corresponding to the form specified.

writeFilterInfo

public static void writeFilterInfo(FormWidget form,
                                   Map info)
Applies filter info into the form specified.

toExpression

public static Expression toExpression(ListFilter filter,
                                      Map info)
Creates a lazy-initialized Expression corresponding to the static ListFilter and request-dependent info.

Expression is actually created when Expression.evaluate(VariableResolver) is first invoked.

toComparatorExpression

public static ComparatorExpression toComparatorExpression(ListOrder order,
                                                          OrderInfo info)
Creates a lazy-initialized ComparatorExpression corresponding to the static ListOrder and request-dependent info.

ComparatorExpression is actually created when ComparatorExpression.compare(VariableResolver, VariableResolver) is first invoked.

getFieldOrder

public static SimpleFieldOrder getFieldOrder(ListOrder listOrder,
                                             String id)
Returns static ordering info about specified field id.

isIgnoreCase

public static boolean isIgnoreCase(SimpleFieldOrder fieldOrder)
Returns true if the corresponding fieldOrder is comparing String objects ignoring their case.
